Corker live @CatoInstitute: "What's being discussed with this latest CR is anything but extreme."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "The federal government is a paradise to find $10 billion in savings throughout it."
Corker speaking @CatoInstitute http://twitpic.com/4i0jx2
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "I don't know of anything we do at government that shouldn't be looked at."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "We'll be sending a signal to the rest of the world that we'll be taking on this problem."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "The easiest way to get down to a healthy number of spending to GDP is for the economy to grow."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "We've got to have some kind of fiscal straitjacket on Washington."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "The CAP Act if it's put in place would cause us to spend $7.6 trillion less over  a 10 year period"
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "What this would force us to do is redesign almost every area of government."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "[The CAP Act] caps spending relative to our economy and gets spending down to the 40 year average."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "The CAP Act would look at every piece of government spending."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "This is the highest level of spending in this country's history since 1945"
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "And in 20 years, we're gonna be at 146 percent of debt to GDP based upon current spending levels."
Corker live @CatoInstitute: "Today we sit at 63 percent of debt to our country's economic output."
